{% codeblock lang:java This is a java %} package chat_client;

import java.awt.; import java.awt.event.; import javax.swing.*;

import util.SwingUtils; /* * 自定义 Dialog * @author 许楠钒 * @date 2018/1/3 /

@SuppressWarnings(“serial”) public class DialogForClient extends JDialog implements ActionListener {

final static int YES = 1, NO = 0;
final static int width = 400;
final static int height = 250;
int message = -1;
JButton Yes,No;
static JTextArea area = new JTextArea(2,10);

public DialogForClient(JFrame frame,String string) {

    super(frame,string,true);

    setLayout(new BorderLayout());
    //SOUTH
    JPanel pl_south = new JPanel();
    Yes = new JButton("确认");
    Yes.addActionListener(this);
    No = new JButton("取消");
    No.addActionListener(this);
    pl_south.add(Yes);
    pl_south.add(No);
    add(pl_south,BorderLayout.SOUTH);
    //CENTER
    JScrollPane pl_center = new JScrollPane(area);  
    area.setLineWrap(true);//字满自动换行
    area.setWrapStyleWord(true);//换行不断字
    area.setEditable(false);
    area.setOpaque(false);
    add(pl_center,BorderLayout.CENTER);
    //设置dialog大小以及位置
    setSize(width, height);
    SwingUtils.popDialogInCenterOfScreen(this);
    addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {
        public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
            message = -1;
            setVisible(false);
        }
    });
}
//设置按钮事件
public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
    if(e.getSource() == Yes) {
        message = YES;
        setVisible(false);
    }
    else if(e.getSource() == No) {
        message = NO;
        setVisible(false);
    }
}
//获取按钮标识
public int getMessage() {
    return message;
}
//设置要提示的信息
public void setInf(String s) {
    area.setText(s);
}

}
